--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, BarbaraSheridan <bsher213@b...> wrote:
> As promised here's part 1 of the Shinsengumi filmography as posted 
by 
> Michael on the NinjaDojo message board---
> 
> Its been a 135 years this month (June)since TOSHIZIO HIJIKATA led a 
> fateful cavalry charge into the SATSUMA rifle corps ,and this 
year "THE 
> SHINSENGUMI "were finaly pardoned for their crimes (????)and 
featured in 
> several KYOTO pagents well heres the film listing
> 
> (1)SHINSENGUMI (1928-SHOCKIKU-Silent 28 mins)
> 
> (2)KOBO SHINSENGUMI (1930 NIKKATSU starring OKOCHI DENJIRO )
> 
> (3) SHINSENGUMI (1938-SCHOCHIKU)
> 
> (4)OKITA SOJI (1940-NIKKATSU) (5)DAIBOSATSU TOGE PT1 (1953)
> 
> (5)KONDO ISAMI IKEDAYA SONDO TOMIYASU IKEDAYA (1953-DAEI)
> 
> (6)THE INTREPID CAPTAIN OF THE SHINSENGUMI (1954 -DAEI Directed by 
KOUNO 
> JIUCHI starring CHIEZO KATAOKA )
> 
> (7)MOYOKEN (BURNING SWORD )(1955-DAEI ,Directed BY KENJI MISUMI )
> 
> ( ( DAIBOSATSU TOGE PT 1 (1957)
> 
> (9) SHINSENGUMI NTV TV SERIES (195
> 
> (10)BAKAMATSU BISHONEN AIZU NO KESHITAI (TOEI )(More SHINSENGUMI 
related 
> its actualy about THE AIZU SUICIDE CORPS and THE WHITE 
TIGERS ,HIJIKATA 
> is included )
> 
> (11)DAIBOSATSU TOGE (DAEI -1960 ,AKA SATANS SWORD w/ RAIZO )
> 
> (12)SHORETSU SHINSENGUMI BAKAMATSU NO DORAN AKA WILD SHINSENGUMI 
REVOLT 
> AT THE END OF THE FEUDAL AGE (1960)
> 
> (13)SHINSENGUMI SHIMATSUKI AKA SHINSENGUMI CHRONICLES (DAEI 1963-
KENJI 
> MISUMI'S adaption of the novel by KAN SHIMOZAWA (ZATOICHI)
TOMISABURO 
> WAKAYAMA plays the most historicaly accurate portrayal of KONDO one 
of 
> the best SHINSENGUMI films
> 
> (14)BAKAMATSU ZANKOKU MONOGATARI AKA CRUEL STORY AT THE END OF THE 
> TOKUGAWA SHOGUNATE (TOEI-1963 )dubbed the "full metal jacket of 
samurai 
> films" director TAI KATO pulls no puches in this harsh depiction of 
the 
> SHINSENGUMI code
> 
> (15)SHINSENGUMI CHIFU ROKU KONDO AKA THE BLOODY RECORD OF THE 
> SHINSENGUMI (1963)
> 
> (16)ANSATSU AKA ASSASSINATION (SCHOCHIKU-1964) SHINODA"s Chronicle 
of 
> ROSHIGUMI leader HACHIRO KIOKAWA
> 
> (17)SHINSENGUMI KEPPUROKU AKA SHINSENGUMI SHOGUNS DEFENSE (TV ASAI 
26 
> EPISODES -1965/66)
> 
> (1 MOYOKEN AKA BURNING SWORD (1966 -Directed by HIROKAZU ICHIMURA 
> starring TSUGI RYOTARO and UCHIDA RYUHEI adapted from a novel by 
RYOTARO 
> SHIBA
> 
> (19) DAIBOSTASU TOGE AKA SWORD OF DOOM (TOH0 1966 directed by 
OKOMOTO 
> KIHACHI )
> 
> (20 )MOYOKEN AKA BURNING SWORD (NT TV SERIES 1966/7)
> 
> (21)RYOMA GA YAKU AKA RYOMA FOREVER (NHK TAIGA DRAMA 1968 "last 
taiga in 
> black and white "SHINSENGUMI guest in some episodes )
> 
> (22)NIHON KENJAKU DEN DAI WUKA OKITA SOJI AKA JAPANESE MASTER 
SWORDSMAN 
> CHRONICLES 'OKITA SOJI (NET TV MOVIE )
> 
> (23)SHINSENGUMI AKA BAND OF ASSASSINS (TOHO-1969 TOSHIRO MIFUNE 
(who 
> also produced)and KINJA KITOJI star in an adaption of RYOTARO 
SHIBA'S 
> novel SHINSENGUMI BAKAMATSU KEPPUROKU )
> 
> (24)SHINSENGUMI (1973 -FUJI TV SERIES 11 EPISODES )
> 
> ok more will follow tommorow.
